VoiceDir3.EDC70: Realizing the Player was made for such work. Hopeful. Respectful. Akarat (Ah-kah-raht)
Line3.EDC70: Please, c-could you cleanse our well? If you can, come to the chapel after. Akarat will return your kindness.
Line1.EDC70: I...forgive me. (deep breath) Our well was taken by the flies. I tried to clear them away, but I was not made for such work.
